title: The Favorites - NFL Week 17 Best Bets with Bob Scucci of Boyd Gaming
itunes:title: The Favorites - NFL Week 17 Best Bets with Bob Scucci of Boyd Gaming
description:
Now a VP at Boyd Gaming in Las Vegas, Bob Scucci is considered by many to be the godfather of the Favorites podcast. For the final episode of 2021, Bob rejoins the show alongside his old friend, Action Network Chief Content Officer Chad Millman and his podcast replacement, professional gambler Simon Hunter. They discuss the sports betting business, the sea change that's taken place since 2018, and so much more.

But first, Chad and Simon play a round of Sharp Calls, narrow down their favorite bets for Week 17, and dive into why this is on the juiciest weeks of the year for professional NFL bettors.

And on behalf of the entire Favorites team, a very Happy New Year to you all, dear listeners. And best of luck heading into 2022!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
